console_open_msg: Haha, you opened the console. Are you trying to discover my secrets?
copy_message: What did you copy? Remember to include the source if you're going to share it.
screenshot_message: Did you take a good picture? Am I cute?
load_rand_textures: I don't have any other outfits yet.
How do you like my new outfit?

t5-7: Good morning! A beautiful day begins in the morning.
t7-11: Good morning! How's work? Don't sit for too long, get up and move around!
t11-14: It's noon now, after working all morning, it's time for lunch!
t14-17: It's easy to get sleepy in the afternoon. Have you completed your exercise goals today?
t17-19: It's evening! The sunset outside is beautiful, nothing compares to a lovely sunset~
t19-21: Good evening, how was your day?
t21-23: It's getting late, time to rest. Good night~
t23-5: Are you a night owl? Staying up this late, can you wake up tomorrow?
default: Hi~ Come and play with me!

text: Would you like to check out {text}?

New Year’s Day, the new year has begun, it's {year}!
It’s Valentine’s Day, have you found a partner this year?
Today is International Women’s Day!
Today is Arbor Day, we should protect the environment.
I’ll tell you a secret~It’s April Fool’s Day, don’t be tricked!
Today is Labor Day, have you planned your holiday yet?
It’s Children’s Day, happy times are always short. Wouldn’t it be nice to never grow up…
Today is CPC Founding Day.
Today is PLA Day.
Victory Day of the Chinese People’s War of Resistance Against Japan, remember history, cherish peace, and create the future.
It’s Teachers’ Day, be sure to greet your teacher~

Who are you spending this year’s Double Eleven with?
It’s Christmas time, I bet you're out shopping again~
